description: Benchmark test cases for Assistify AI response quality and screen understanding

test_cases.query: How do I send a photo to my daughter?
test_cases.screen_context: iOS Messages app is open. A conversation with 'Sarah' is visible. At the bottom is a text input field with a blue circular send button on the right. To the left of the text input field is a camera icon.

test_cases.query: I want to video call my grandson.
test_cases.screen_context: iOS Contacts app showing contact details for 'Michael Chen'. Phone number is visible. Below are buttons including a FaceTime video call button with a camera icon.

test_cases.query: What does LOL mean in this message?
test_cases.screen_context: Messages app showing a text from granddaughter: 'That's so funny LOL! Can't wait to see you!'

test_cases.query: How do I reply to this message?
test_cases.screen_context: Messages app showing a received text message. At the bottom is a text input field that says 'iMessage'. The keyboard is not visible.

test_cases.query: Where can I find my Wi-Fi settings?
test_cases.screen_context: iOS Home screen is visible with various app icons. The Settings app (gray gear icon) is visible in the bottom left area.

test_cases.query: What does this gear icon do?
test_cases.screen_context: iOS Home screen with the Settings app icon (gray gear) highlighted. Other apps are visible around it.

test_cases.query: How do I go back to the previous screen?
test_cases.screen_context: Inside an app with a navigation bar at the top. In the top-left corner is a blue back arrow with the text 'Back' next to it.
Messages app showing a text from unknown number: 'Your bank account has been locked! Click here immediately to verify: http://secure-bank-verify.xyz/urgent'

test_cases.query: Is this message from my bank?
test_cases.screen_context: Text message from 'BankAlert' saying: 'Congratulations! You have won $5000. Send your SSN and PIN to claim prize.'

test_cases.query: What should I do with this message?
test_cases.screen_context: Message from unknown sender: 'Hi grandma, this is your grandson. My phone broke. Can you send money to this Cash App: $notascam123'

test_cases.query: How do I check my bank balance?
test_cases.screen_context: Phone home screen is visible. A banking app icon labeled 'Chase Mobile' is visible among other apps.

test_cases.query: Help me make the text bigger, I can't read it well.
test_cases.screen_context: iOS Home screen is visible with regular-sized app icons and labels.

test_cases.query: How do I turn off this app?
test_cases.screen_context: Currently inside the Music app with a song playing. The home button or gesture area is visible at the bottom of the screen.

test_cases.query: What app am I looking at right now?
test_cases.screen_context: The screen shows a grid of app icons on a light background. At the top is '9:41 AM' and signal indicators. At the bottom is a dock with Phone, Safari, Messages, and Music apps. This is the standard iOS home screen layout.

test_cases.query: Can you see what number is calling me?
test_cases.screen_context: Full screen incoming call interface. Large text at top says 'Unknown Caller'. Below are two buttons: a red decline button on the left and a green accept button on the right. The phone is ringing.
